name: Machship Shipping
author: Machship

sections.description:
Generate Real-Time Delivery Pricing In Your WooCommerce Checkout, And Automatically Sync Your WooCommerce Orders To MachShip
* Connect to 125+ Leading Australian Carriers
* Add Live Carrier Pricing In Your Checkout
* Add either percentage or fixed fee margins to your freight prices

This Plugin requires WooCommerce plugin and Machship Account.
Machship is a cloud-based freight management software that centrally manages your entire freight task, across all your carriers.
Fusedship is a part of Machship that do custom integrations and syncs Ecommerce platforms and Machship. Read more here

By connecting your WooCommerce store to your MachShip account you can charge your customer what you’re going to be charged and never lose on freight.

Our full integrated carrier list can be found here.

This plugin is using a third party api :
* https://live.machship.com/apiv2 – Legacy mode
* https://sync.fusedship.com – Dynamic mode

Modes :
– Legacy mode, connects to Machship directly to quote shipping methods
– Dynamic mode, connects to Fusedship integration to quote shipping methods with customizable features that the customer wants (Suggested)

Reference :
Terms and Condition / Policy
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Install Woocommerce in your wordpress
  2. Install Machship Shipping plugin
  3. Click to Woocommerce in the sidebar and select “Settings”
  4. Open Shipping tab
  5. Click a Zone and add Machship Shipping as one of your Shipping Method
  6. Machship Shipping settings
    1. In the subtabs of Shipping, click “Machship Shipping” subtab. Please check screenshot
    2. Tick Enable Machship Shipping
    3. Contact Machship for the Credentials and token needed for this plugin to fully work
    4. Add Widget descriptions
    5. Add Shipping Margins
    6. Add Messages when No available Shipping
    7. Add Contact us information
    8. Add Warehouses locations
    9. Add Quick Quote label and position
    10. Then save
  7. Migrate Product Box
    1. Click to Woocommerce in the sidebar and select “Machship Product Box Migration”
    2. Select package type
    3. Choose any warehouse you created earlier
    4. Then Click Go
  8. Manually Edit Product
    1. Click Product in the sidebar
    2. Select which product to edit
    3. Scroll down and look for “Product Quote Settings Customisations”
    4. Tick Enable
    5. (Optional) Add international fields
    6. Select warehouse availability
    7. Add number of items/boxes for this product
    8. Then fill in the dimensions/weight of the item/box
    9. Select package type
    10. After all changes click Product page “Update”
sections.faq:
Do I require a Machship account to use this plugin?

Yes – to use this plugin, you will need to have a Machship account with your carriers and rates loaded in.

Can it show a single price, which is the cheapest of my carriers?

Absolutely – we can group your carriers and return the cheapest price.

Will shipping prices include residential fees and tailgate fees for heavy items?

Yes – we can set a threshold for tailgate fees and either:
a) ask customers if they are a business/residential address
b) charge a residential surcharge to all customers
sections.changelog:

* Fix Billing/Shipping address on checkout
* upon tick on different shipping address, the request won’t send the inputted postcode

* Added Product meta selection
* select meta that will appended to live rate as product attributes

= 1.3.3
* Fix is_residential missing

= 1.3.2
* Fix groupings properly with multiple different warehouses
* to show all quoted prices merge by same Grouping

1.3.1

  • add fallback for warehouse id if nothing found

1.3.0

  • Added new menu and page for import/export product box settings
  • Optimize plugin and removed unnecessary libraries

1.2.29

  • Official Release
  • Clean up all warnings logs
  • Fix dynamic liverate unnecessary quotes
